entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
